pages.privacy-policy: LaptopLoom Privacy Policy - Protecting Your Personal Information LaptopLoom HOME ABOUT US Products Contact Privacy Policy This privacy policy outlines how LaptopLoom collects, uses, and protects your personal information. Information We Collect Information you provide voluntarily, such as your name and email address when subscribing to our newsletter or leaving comments. Information collected automatically through cookies and other tracking technologies, such as browsing data and IP address. How We Use Your Information To improve the user experience and personalize your visit to our website. To send you newsletters, promotional emails, and other marketing communications (with your consent). To respond to your inquiries and requests. For analytics and research purposes. Data Sharing and Disclosure We will not share your personal information with third parties except in the following cases: With service providers who help us operate our website and business (these providers are bound by strict confidentiality agreements). To comply with legal or regulatory requirements. In the event of a merger or acquisition. Your Choices You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You can also opt out of receiving marketing communications from us. Data Security LaptopLoom takes reasonable steps to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. Changes to this Privacy Policy We reserve the right to update this privacy policy at any time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the revised policy on our website. The LaptopLoom website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. pages.terms-conditions: LaptopLoom Terms and Conditions - Rules for Website Use and Purchases LaptopLoom HOME ABOUT US Products Contact Terms and Conditions Welcome to LaptopLoom! These terms and conditions ("Terms") govern your use of our website . By accessing or using our website, you agree to be bound by these Terms. Use of Website You may use our website for lawful purposes only. You may not use our website in any way that could damage, disable, overburden, or impair our servers or networks. You may not post any content that is illegal, obscene, defamatory, or otherwise violates our Terms. Disclaimer of Warranties Our website is provided "as is" and without warranties of any kind, express or implied. This includes, but is not limited to, direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, and punitive damages. Indemnification You agree to indemnify and hold harmless LaptopLoom and its officers, directors, employees, agents, and affiliates from any and all claims, liabilities, damages, costs, and expenses (including attorneys' fees) arising out of or related to your use of our website. Term and Termination These Terms are effective upon your access to our website. We may terminate these Terms at any time for any reason. The provisions of these Terms that by their nature should survive termination shall survive termination. Governing Law These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws. Entire Agreement These Terms constitute the entire agreement between you and LaptopLoom regarding your use of our website.
